QuestData.Title: The Sapphire Queen
QuestData.Description: Bristlepine can be dangerous, but most stay far away from wolvar. Wasps on other hand not fear the Frenzyheart... they even kill some of our hunters.$B$BI know Rakjak want wasp queen dead, but no wolvar want to go into her hive. You go kill wasp queen in Sapphire Hive to southeast and get stinger for Rakjak. Me bet Rakjak like that.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Stinger of the Sapphire Queen to High-Shaman Rakjak at Frenzyheart Hill.$B$BIf you lose Dajik's Worn Chalk, speak to Elder Harkek in Frenzyheart Hill.
QuestData.RewardText: You killed queen wasp! You stronger than Rakjak thought.$B$BMaybe wasps go away now and stop attacking Frenzyheart hunters.
